root.name: Smack Wacker
root.description: OverviewWhile Smack Wacker follows the basic gameplay of Pac-Man in many ways, the two retain some differences. Firstly, the maze in Smack Wacker is made up of concentric squares with gaps in the wall between them that constantly move. Secondly, the player has a health meter (labelled "Power") and is able to collide with bacteria a number of times before dying. Thirdly, while there are no power-ups on the board, the player can temporarily destroy the bacteria by running into them if one of their three "supers" are deployed.
